document_data.mainbody:
Pooky was an imp who served as the familiar of the mage Amon during the midâ€“14 century DR.
Pooky was a competent spellcaster.
The imp liked to poke fun at Amons companion Smaeluv Orcslicer by referring to him as "Smelly". Smaeluv in turn wanted to respond with violence.
Pooky saw Amon as a sort of paternal figure, regularly referring to him as "Papa".
